isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - INJECTION PUMP, NOZZLES, FUEL FILTER, SUPPLY PUMP AND GLOW PLUGS - FUEL INJECTION NOZZLES - CLEANING (NOZZLE BORE IN CYLINDER HEAD)

step1.para: Thoroughly clean nozzle bore in cylinder head using nozzle seat cleaner ZTSE4139, before re-inserting nozzle holder assembly. Pay particular attention to seating surfaces, in order that no small particles of carbon will cause assembly to be cocked or permit blow-by of combustion gases.

Clean injection nozzle seats in cylinder head ( Figure 9.49
) using nozzle seat cleaner ZTSE4139 as follows:

step2.para:
Insert the threaded sleeve of the nozzle seat cleaner, into the nozzle bore of the cylinder head as shown in Figure 9.49
.
Use a 9/16 in. socket to turn the nozzle seat cleaner and remove any carbon build-up from the seat. Blow out with filtered compressed air.

step1.para: With nozzle bore cleaned, cover cylinder head bores with protective caps from ZTSE4135 until nozzles are reinstalled.
